See also: kino, кино, and kinō

German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Clipping of Kinematograph.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈkiːnoː/
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Kino n (genitive Kinos, plural Kinos)

  1. cinema
